title.narrative: Increase capacity and resilience of poor people Climate Change

description.narrative: Local Economic Development - CARE: 1. household food and nutrition security – conservation agriculture techniques involving Farmer Field Schools, 2. improved production, 3. marketing and commercialization of raw cashew nuts; 4. strengthening resilience to natural disasters and climate change through adaptation, livelihood diversification efforts aimed at generating non-farm and non-natural resource based incomes, 5. community based micro finance approaches through Village Saving and Loans Associations (VSLA),

Through the gender and power inequality; empowerment of the most vulnerable, women in particular, in decision-making in their households, communities, and in local governance (engagement with local consultative councils); using a rights based approach, advocate & facilitate access to social protection schemes
